data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barros, Luana Machado, Soares, Matheus Mickael Mota, Freitas-Silva, Rafael Augusto Pinheiro De, Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2019): Neotropical Chvalaea Papp & Földvári (Diptera: Hybotidae: Ocydromiinae): new records, an illustrated key to species and description of three new species. Zootaxa 4571 (3): 347-362, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.3.3|15 occurrences
